Package main

Class Spaceship

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Spaceship
  • public class Spaceship
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Spaceship()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void asteroidCollision()
      Called through the AsteroidBelt class when an asteroid collision occurs
      Decreases the spaceship health by an amount:
      – If shield health is over (or equals to) 50 %, scales shield health by 4.2%
      – If shield health is under 50%, then decreases it by 19%
      – If shield is at 0% or under, set shield health to 0
      void flyToPlanet​(Planet planet, CrewMember crewMember1, CrewMember crewMember2)
      Called when spaceship flies to another planet
      Additionally, calls a method from AsteroidBelt class
      that checks if the spaceship enters an asteroid belt,
      and if so it will damage the ship
      Also calls spaceshipExplodes() to check if the spaceship has exploded
      double getSpaceshipHealth()
      Obtains a spaceship's shield health
      java.lang.String getSpaceshipName()
      Obtains a spaceship's name
      boolean isAsteroid()
      Obtains status of asteroid collision, returns true of collision
      boolean isExploded()
      Obtains the status of a spaceship; i.e.
      void repairSpaceship​(CrewMember crewMember)
      Takes a crew member and repairs the spaceship's shield
      Shield health is increased by the crew member's repair rate
      If shield health is over 100%, set shield health to 100%
      void setAsteroid​(boolean isAsteroid)
      Sets up boolean asteroid collision, if asteroid collision occurs
      void setSpaceshipName​(java.lang.String spaceshipName)
      Sets up a spaceship's name
      void spaceshipExplodes()
      Called to check the spaceship's shield health
      If health is less than or equals to 0, sets spaceship
      status (isExplosion) to true; spaceship has exploded

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Obtains a spaceship's name

        public double getSpaceshipHealth()
        Obtains a spaceship's shield health
        Returns:
        double Spaceship health

      • repairSpaceship

        public void repairSpaceship​(CrewMember crewMember)
        Takes a crew member and repairs the spaceship's shield
        Shield health is increased by the crew member's repair rate
        If shield health is over 100%, set shield health to 100%
        Parameters:
        crewMember -

      • isExploded

        public boolean isExploded()
        Obtains the status of a spaceship; i.e. if the spaceship is fine or has exploded
        Returns:
        boolean Spaceship explosion

      • spaceshipExplodes

        public void spaceshipExplodes()
        Called to check the spaceship's shield health
        If health is less than or equals to 0, sets spaceship
        status (isExplosion) to true; spaceship has exploded

      • flyToPlanet

        public void flyToPlanet​(Planet planet,
                        CrewMember crewMember1,
                        CrewMember crewMember2)
        Called when spaceship flies to another planet
        Additionally, calls a method from AsteroidBelt class
        that checks if the spaceship enters an asteroid belt,
        and if so it will damage the ship
        Also calls spaceshipExplodes() to check if the spaceship has exploded
        Parameters:
        planet - Planet object to traverse to
        crewMember1 - Pilot member 1
        crewMember2 - Pilot member 2

      • isAsteroid

        public boolean isAsteroid()
        Obtains status of asteroid collision, returns true of collision
        Returns:
        boolean Asteroid collision

      • setAsteroid

        public void setAsteroid​(boolean isAsteroid)
        Sets up boolean asteroid collision, if asteroid collision occurs
        Parameters:
        isAsteroid - Asteroid collision

      • asteroidCollision

        public void asteroidCollision()
        Called through the AsteroidBelt class when an asteroid collision occurs
        Decreases the spaceship health by an amount:
        – If shield health is over (or equals to) 50 %, scales shield health by 4.2%
        – If shield health is under 50%, then decreases it by 19%
        – If shield is at 0% or under, set shield health to 0
